plurals.name: fui_error_weak_password
plurals.item: Use at least %1$d character and a mix of letters and numbers
Use at least %1$d characters and a mix of letters and numbers

string.name: fui_missing_first_and_last_name
string.translation_description: Inline error for empty email address in input field. [CHAR_LIMIT=60]

string.name: fui_name_hint
string.translation_description: Hint for last name input field

string.name: fui_trouble_signing_in
string.translation_description: Link leading to forgot password flow
